txt.en:
'The lamp is ready. It took a while to figure out exactly how all the pieces went together and how to get it to work -- and it is far from perfect -- but I believe it will work well enough for our purposes.

'What I need you to do is search this area and see if you can find a hidden door that is revealed by the lamp's light. The old records carried out of Khazad-dûm indicate that there should have been one such door somewhere within the Great Delving, probably somewhere close to the Dolven-view.

'If you can find the door, perhaps we may yet be able to go inside.'

'My thanks to you, [placeholder], for finding that door. Unfortunately, an impatient group of dwarves rushed to explore it before we had a chance to scout it. They were ambushed and slaughtered by a vicious band of goblins who have somehow sneaked their way in there.\n\n'Goblins -- in one of our most carefully hidden places! Is there no stone in Khazad-dûm left unturned by their vile hands? What shall we do?'
'Keep looking, [placeholder]...the old notes make it clear that there is a hidden door around here somewhere...unfortunately, the notes do not tell us exactly where to find it.'
HIDING CONTENT - DNT - Mapping the Dolven-view Dwarf-door
Wathi rebuilt an ancient blue dwarf-lamp for you. He told you that this lamp will show you a hidden dwarf-door in the Dolven-view area.
The dwarf-door lies hidden somewhere in the Dolven-view.\n\nWathi has told you to use the lamp to find a hidden dwarf-door.
Talk to Wathi at the Dolven-view camp
Wathis is at the Dolven-view camp.\n\nYou searched the Dolven-view and found an ancient, hidden dwarf-door. You should tell Wathi of your discovery.
